title: Content Marketing Specialist
description:
GrowVibe Marketing Seeks Content Marketing Specialist (Full-Time)

GrowVibe Marketing, a Mumbai-based agency, creates compelling content for clients in tech, education, and lifestyle. We’re excited to invite a Content Marketing Specialist to join our team and craft stories that engage audiences.

Role Overview
You’ll develop content strategies and create materials that drive brand awareness and engagement across digital platforms.

Key Duties
- Create content for blogs, social media, and email campaigns.
- Collaborate with designers to produce visual assets.
- Analyze performance using Google Analytics and SEMrush.
- Optimize content for SEO and engagement.
- Manage content calendars and deadlines.
- Conduct audience research to tailor content.
- Stay updated on content marketing trends.
- Prepare performance reports for clients.
- Support client meetings to discuss content strategies.
- Contribute to thought leadership content.

Qualifications
We’re looking for candidates with 2–3 years of experience in content marketing, proficient in Google Analytics, SEMrush, and SEO tools. Strong writing and editing skills are essential, along with experience in B2C content. A Bachelor’s degree in marketing, journalism, or a related field is required.

Why GrowVibe?
We’re a creative agency that values storytelling and innovation. Our hybrid work model offers flexibility, and we support your growth with training programs and access to premium tools. You’ll work on diverse projects in a collaborative environment.

Benefits
Health insurance
Provident fund contributions
18 days of annual leave
Professional development budget
Access to content tools
Team social events

Join Us
If you’re passionate about content marketing, apply now to join GrowVibe Marketing!
